Package com.forgerock.reactive

Class ReactiveFilter<C,​I1,​O1,​I2,​O2>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.reactive.ReactiveFilter<C,​I1,​O1,​I2,​O2>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - Context in which the filter will be evaluated
    I1 - Type of the request received by this filter
    O1 - Type of the response answered by this filter
    I2 - Type of the request emitted to the handler/next filter
    O2 - Type of the response emitted by the handler/next filter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReactiveFilter.SimpleReactiveFilter
    public abstract class ReactiveFilter<C,​I1,​O1,​I2,​O2>
extends Object
    Filters and/or transforms the request and/or response of an exchange. +--------+ +---------+ ---> I1 ---> | | ---> I2 ---> | | | Filter | | Handler | <--- O1 --< | | <--- O2 <--- | | +--------+ +---------+ +--------+ +---------+ +---------+ ---> I1 ---> | One | ---> I2 ---> | AndThen | ---> I3 ---> | | | Filter | | Filter | | Handler | <--- O1 --< | | <--- O2 <--- | | <--- O3 ---< | | +--------+ +---------+ +---------+

    • Method Detail

      • andThen

        public ReactiveFilter<C,​I1,​O1,​I2,​O2> andThen​(boolean condition,
                                                                     ReactiveFilter<C,​I2,​O2,​I2,​O2> next)
        Optionally concatenate a new filter to this filter.
        Parameters:
        condition - If true, next will be concatenated to this filter
        next - The filter to optionally concatenate with this one
        Returns:
        If condition is true, returns the concatenation of this filter and next. Otherwise, return this filter.

      • andThen

        public <I3,​O3> ReactiveFilter<C,​I1,​O1,​I3,​O3> andThen​(ReactiveFilter<C,​I2,​O2,​I3,​O3> next)
        Concatenate a transformer filter to this filter.
        Type Parameters:
        I3 - Target type of the request transformed by the filter
        O3 - Source type of the response transformed by the filter
        Parameters:
        next - The transformer filter to add after this filter.
        Returns:
        A new ReactiveFilter results of the concatenation of this filter and the transformer filter

      • andThen

        public ReactiveFilter<C,​I1,​O1,​I2,​O2> andThen​(ReactiveFilter.SimpleReactiveFilter<C,​I2,​O2> next)
        Add a new filtering step after this one.
        Parameters:
        next - The filter to add after this one
        Returns:
        A new ReactiveFilter result of the concatenation of this filter and next

      • andThen

        public ReactiveHandler<C,​I1,​O1> andThen​(ReactiveHandler<C,​I2,​O2> handler)
        Terminate the filter chain with the specified handler.
        Parameters:
        handler - ReactiveHandler in charge of processing the request
        Returns:
        A new ReactiveHandler results of the concatenation of this filter and handler

      • filter

        public abstract O1 filter​(C context,
                          I1 request,
                          ReactiveHandler<C,​I2,​O2> next)
                   throws Exception
        Perform the request and/or response filtering and/or transformation.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the filtering/transformation
        request - Request to filter
        next - ReactiveHandler to call once the filtering/transformation is done
        Returns:
        The filtered and/or transformed response
        Throws:
        Exception - If the operation cannot be done
